actions.recommendation: Lower ‘bad’ cholesterol by limiting saturated & trans fats, add healthy fats i.e. omega 3 fatty acids, eat more plant-based foods & replacing all refined carbs with those high in fibre.

Increased waist circumference (> cm) is associated with a higher risk of heart disease and diabetes. To decrease your risk of a cardiovascular events aim for a BMI of <25 and a waist-to-height ratio of <50%.
